predicate.note: Frames file for 'shield' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: all args
example.text: Researchers at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, N.M., reported they went so far as *trace* to take a ``cold fusion'' experiment and three neutron detectors into a tunnel under 300 feet of granite *trace* to shield the detectors from cosmic rays.

example.name: unstated danger
example.text: But there were enough promoters announcing the end of history (in this case suspension of normal laws of economic gravity) for society to continue *trace* shielding its eyes.
